answer: Net financial debt at September 30, 2025, was 21,695 million euros, increasing to 21,967 million euros. The reduction was driven by a 2,124 million euro increase in cash and cash equivalents, and a decrease of 4,643 million euros in net financial assets, primarily from the decrease in net financial liabilities by 4,452 million euros. Net financial debt at the end of the period is expected to be 20,539 million euros.
ground_truth: Sum of long-term borrowings, short-term borrowings, current portion of long-term borrowings, other non-current and current financial liabilities, minus cash and cash equivalents, minus other current and non-current financial assets; reported per ESMA Guideline no. 39 (2021-03-04), effective from 2021-05-05, and CONSOB Warning Notice no. 5/21 (2021-04-29)
